mapper.insert: insert into t_user_wallet (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, USERID, PASSWORD, BALANCE, FROZENBALANCE, IDCARD, CARDNUMBER, TELEPHONE, SMSCODE, ISSEND ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frozenbalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issend,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update t_user_wallet set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROZENBALANCE = #{frozenbalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDNUMBER = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSCODE = #{smscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSEND = #{issend,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, USERID, PASSWORD, BALANCE, FROZENBALANCE, IDCARD, CARDNUMBER, TELEPHONE, SMSCODE, ISSEND from t_user_wallet where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, USERID, PASSWORD, BALANCE, FROZENBALANCE, IDCARD, CARDNUMBER, TELEPHONE, SMSCODE, ISSEND from t_user_wallet
